ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Su, Don t forget to ban the next person that spams that eqtotalsecrets thingy!  ;-) What I hate more is when SOE tells us about an exploit they patched. I
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Su,
Don't forget to ban the next person that spams that eqtotalsecrets
thingy! ;-)

What I hate more is when SOE tells us about an exploit they patched. I never
knew about it and therefore didn't take advantage of it and now I can't!
BAH! SOE don't tease me this way! LOL

luv,
